database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Integration-independent Transgenic Huntington Disease Fragment Mouse Models
entry.description:
Data from Integration-independent Transgenic Huntington Disease Fragment Mouse Models Reveal Distinct Phenotypes and Life Span in Vivo
CoIP of HTT full length and fragment proteins from mouse cortical lysates. Controlled with preimmune mouse IgG IP.
